aliases: Crimson Cowl , Ultron-5, Ultron-6, Ultron-7, Ultron-8, Ultron-9, Ultron-10, Ultron-11, Ultron-12, Ultron-13, Ultron-14, Ultron-15, Ultron-16, Ultron-17, Ultron-18

marvel.description: Arguably the greatest and certainly the most horrific creation of scientific genius Dr. Henry Pym, Ultron is a criminally insane rogue sentient robot dedicated to conquest and the extermination of humanity.

name: Ultron
powersText: Artificial intelligence with genius level intellect
abilities of robotic body vary with each redesign but generally include hidden weapons
durability and stamina and extreme projection of concussion blasts from his fingertips.
